languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Офицер{/g} предоставляет союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} вместе с полным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Во время этого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} союзник может совершить неограниченное число атак.

traits.locale_text:
- The Leader grants an ally an extra turn with full AP and MP.
- During the extra turn, the ally does not have a limit on attacks.
The Leader grants an ally an extra turn with full AP and MP. During the extra turn, the ally does not have a limit on the number of attacks.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.

Во время этого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} союзник может совершить неограниченное число атак.

During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.

traits.locale_text: Лидер предоставляет союзнику дополнительный ход вместе с полным запасом ОД и ОП. Во время этого хода союзник может совершить неограниченное число атак.
Лидер предоставляет союзнику дополнительный ход вместе с полным запасом ОД и ОП. Во время этого хода союзник может совершить неограниченное число атак.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}赋予一名盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}全部恢复。在此额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，该盟友的攻击次数不受限制。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}赋予一名盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}全部恢复。在此额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，该盟友的攻击次数不受限制。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} otorga a un aliado un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Durante este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra, no hay límite de ataques.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.

traits.locale_text: El oficial otorga a un aliado un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Durante este turno {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}extra{/g}, no existe límite al número de ataques del aliado.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} gewährt einem Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit vollen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzzugs{/g} gibt es kein Angriffslimit.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.

traits.locale_text: Der Offizier gewährt einem Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit vollen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzzugs{/g} ignoriert der Verbündete das Limit für die Anzahl der Angriffe.

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} confère à un allié un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec le maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire, aucune limite du nombre maximum d'attaques ne s'applique.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.

traits.locale_text: Le Leader confère à un allié un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec le maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Pendant ce tour supplémentaire, aucune limite ne s'applique au nombre d'attaques de l'allié.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が最大の味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与える。追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、その味方は攻撃回数の制限がなくなる。

During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が最大の味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与える。追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、その味方は攻撃回数の制限がなくなる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}, bir dost birime tam {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'ye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır. Bu ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} esnasında saldırı sınırı yoktur.

During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.
